09-12-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick damage reduced from 100 to 80
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick spirit scaling increased from 1.2 to 1.5
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick card projectiles spawn above the reticle rather than on the left side
08-15-2024: - Improved {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith tracers to feel more connected to their bullet
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick now has 0.5s cd per cast
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis T2 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Full Auto|Size=20} Full Auto T2 changed to Imbues Bullets with +5 Spirit Damage (only affects Wraith)
- Fixed being able to melee and parry while stunned by Wraith's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis
08-01-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick post cast time reduced from 0.5s to 0.2s
- Fixed some issues {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick tracking that could cause it to orb players or go to the wrong spot
07-18-2024: - Raised volume of Wraith {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick charge up sound effect
- Base ammo increased by 5% (except for Haze and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith)
07-11-2024: - Global base Ammo increased by 5% (except for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith and Haze)
06-27-2024: - The {AbilityIcon|Ability=Royal Flush|Size=20} Royal Flush ability has been replaced with Card Trick. Card Trick enables Wraith's weapon damage to summon playing cards. Activating the ability throws one of the cards, which will fly towards the enemy or point under the crosshair and explode on impact.
05-30-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Project Mind|Size=20} Project Mind cooldown reduced from 50s to 45s
05-23-2024: - Added new slide and reload animation for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith
- Improved visibility of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith’s bullet and travel path
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith’s gun
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Royal Flush|Size=20} Royal Flush no longer has a cast delay
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Royal Flush|Size=20} Royal Flush time to spawn cards increased from 0.4s to 0.6s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20} Telekinesis no longer allows the victim to shoot back
